metadata.name: Act I
metadata.description:
«Mеmеnto mori»

All the beauty and transience of life. I have tried to convey  a dramaturgy  in three moments (the past (Act I ), the present (Act II ), and the future (Act III )), striking in its tragic dynamism: the past crashes into the present, losing everything it holds dear, and the future collapses on the present, burying it under itself.
